header.title: The Fastest Pizza âš¡  Delivery
header.text: We will deliver juicy pizza for your family in 30 minutes, if the courier is late - pizza is free!

section1.textmenus: Filling: onion, potato, tomato, mushrooms, cheese, olives, meat...

section3.text: There are regular events in our pizzeria that will allow you to eat delicious food for a lower price!

Aboutus.textp1: In just a couple of years, we have opened 6 outlets in different cities: Kazan, Chelyabinsk, Ufa, Samara, Izhevsk, and in the future we plan to develop the network in other major cities of Russia.
Aboutus.textp2: The kitchen of each point is at least: 400-500 sq. m. meters, hundreds of employees, smoothly performing work in order to receive / prepare / form / deliver customer orders on time.
